fact: The first computer bug was a real moth found trapped in a Harvard Mark II relay in 1947. 🦋
Python was named after the comedy group 'Monty Python', not the snake! 🐍
The first domain name ever registered was Symbolics.com on March 15, 1985.
About 90% of the world's currency only exists on computers today. Physical cash is a tiny fraction!
CAPTCHA stands for 'Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart'.
